browse.desc: open browser and view experiment details

delete_points.desc: delete multiple points from multiple entries

get_all_meta.desc: get all meta information from all entries

get_unique_keys_from_list.desc: get unique keys from list of experiments

list_points.desc: list all points in a given entry

load_pipeline.desc: load pipeline info (id and dictionary contents)

load_point.desc: load all info about a given point (and subpoint)

multi_stat_analysis.desc: perform statistical analysis (with multiple points at the same time)

prepare_selector.desc: prepare first level of experiments with pruning

replay.desc: replay experiment == the same as reproduce

rerun.desc: rerun experiment == the same as reproduce

sort_table.desc: sort table, substitute index with a sequence (html)

stat_analysis.desc: process multiple experimental results and perform statistial analysis (including expected values)

substitute_x_with_loop.desc: substitute x axis in table with a sequence
